mapper.sql: db_id, address, purpose, area, house_type, floor, build_year, USER_ID, create_time
mapper.insert:
insert into hx_db
db_id,
address,
purpose,
area,
house_type,
floor,
build_year,
USER_ID,
create_time,

mapper.update:
update hx_db
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
purpose = #{purpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
house_type = #{houseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
floor = #{floor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
build_year = #{buildYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where db_id = #{dbId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update hx_db set address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purpose = #{purpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, house_type = #{houseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, floor = #{floor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, build_year = #{buildYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where db_id = #{dbId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from hx_db order by create_time,db_id

select
from hx_db u where 1 = 1
and (u.address like #{pd.keyword} or u.area like #{pd.keyword} or u.purpose like #{pd.keyword})
order by u.create_time,u.db_id
